evals.prompt: I have an Excel file called sales_report.xlsx. Can you tell me what sheets are in it and show me the first 10 rows from the main sheet?
evals.expected_output: Uses ExcelCLI to list sheets with 'info' command, then reads data with 'read' command using --limit 10 and --json flags
expectations: Runs 'info' command first to discover sheets
Checks the 'success' field in JSON response before processing
Runs 'read' command with --limit 10 to show first rows
Presents the results clearly to the user

evals.prompt: Find all cells in the 'Customers' sheet of contacts.xlsx that contain the name 'Silva'.
evals.expected_output: Uses ExcelCLI search command with case-insensitive text matching
expectations: Searches for 'Silva' (the search is case-insensitive by default)
Parses JSON response and presents matching cells to user
Shows cell addresses and values from search results

evals.prompt: What's the value in cell D15 of the Budget sheet in financials.xlsx? I need to know what type of data it is too.
evals.expected_output: Uses ExcelCLI cell command to extract single cell with type information
expectations: Uses 'cell' command to read a specific cell
Correctly specifies sheet name 'Budget' and cell address 'D15'
Extracts and presents both the value and the type from JSON response
Shows the cell type (string, number, date, etc.) to the user
Checks 'success' field before processing the result
